segments.text: Hello , Mr Lawson . It's a pleasure to see you again . You seem to be in here all the time at the moment ! What can I do for you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've prepared some L / C documents , all in accordance with the conditions . There shouldn't be any problems ; I've done about a million of these things recently .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're right , no problems . You are becoming quite the expert , Mr Lawson . If any problem does turn up , which I'm sure it won't , I'll give you a call .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks very much . I'm sure I'll be back , so see you again soon . Bye !
segments.speaker: S2
